lessons.japanese: テレビを見た後で宿題するよ。
lessons.indonesian: I'll do my homework after I watch television.

lessons.japanese: テレビ見てから宿題するね。

lessons.japanese: テレビを見た後で宿題するよ。
lessons.indonesian: I'll do my homework after I watch television.

lessons.japanese: 宿題するの忘れんなよ。いいか？
lessons.indonesian: Don't forget to do your homework, okay?

lessons.japanese: 私んちで、一緒に研究課題するのはどう？
lessons.indonesian: How about we go to my place to work on the project together?
